name: blame
description: Blame a user a certain number of times.

options.name: count
options.description: The number of times to blame the user.

name: top
description: Get the top users who have blamed Serena the most.

name: updateraidtime
description: Update the next raid time for a specific channel.

options.name: month
options.description: The month of the next raid.

options.name: day
options.description: The day of the next raid (1-31).

options.name: time
options.description: The time of the next raid in HH:MM format.

options.name: next_raid
options.description: The name of the next raid.

options.name: channel_name
options.description: The name of the channel to update.

name: setname
description: Set the bot's name for this server.

options.name: name
options.description: The name to set for the bot.

name: setavatar
description: Set the bot's avatar for this server.

options.name: url
options.description: The URL of the image to set as the bot's avatar.
